author: m.kalinin
content:
If we follow the update path started at the bridge we will likely have 2 or 3 hard forks on Eth1. And at least 1 HF on beacon chain. Taking in account implementation and governance burden, the merge with one HF looks much better.

Currently, I need some time to finish the research. And after that I will be likely looking at the work required to be done on Eth2 side towards the merge.
